item.description:
Let go out and celebrate the beauty of this great summer with a little jigging and jagging in a great restaurant where they do seperate checks, A/C, huge lounge, flat screen TV's and a DJ that gets this place hopping.

Feel free to come join me for a bite to eat around 7:30 and then after that lets head off to the dance floor, or just come to dance later on no cover charge!!!

 Please if you are able to come let me know if you will be there for dinner or just dancing as I will do my best to accomodate a table big enough if i know who is coming, the RSVP's are greatly appreciated :) This meet up is posted on several other sights.

 

DJ starts at 9pm and plays excellant tunes  any where from the 70's to great hits of the 80's and more,  dance floor is huge and the crowd is anywhere from 21-70, yes its quite diversified. This group is not only for singles, couples are alslo welcome to join the more the merrier.

 

 I can be reached via my cell 978-857-6626 ( having problems with my computer, time for a newby).

 

Dress attire is optional, what ever you feel comfortable in works :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be close to the dance floor, having dinner, I look like my picture as well.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner, dancing and just plain hanging out.
